First of all is correct that on install you need to select case 2 (for english) and if you have the latest video driver never, but never try to instalate the ageia physx provided by the game, or direct X. For me having directX 10 could be a problem installing directX 9. As for the game it was so fucking annoying that I have uninstall before finishing. My rate because of this is 2/10. Astounding graphics but too scripted even for the order in which you can run into a room and if you don't understand for the first time what you need to do, the enemies continue to respawn. And the most idiotic thing, weapons from enemis could not be used, just like delta force 4 incredible for a game in 2011!

Install went okay, chose second option to get English. Ran the game, got through the intro, game crashed in the first level when I tried to open the door. 

 Read in the comments that the Skidrow update might solve it, downloaded and installed said update, now when I start the game nothing happens, after a minute the message "Steam must be running to play this game." Pops up. And in the Binaries map a file called "HOMEFRONT.exe.3072.STEAMSTART" is created. 

Simply put, this does not work for me. Fan-Fucking-Tastic! =D

Reinstalled, this time no Skidrow patch or whatever, fiddling around with the options sometimes boots me to desktop, sometimes not. This time I could open the door in the first room, and got to the busride, but now the sound is garbled and laggy, framerate not to smooth either. Will try the sound fix but expecting another shitheap.

Not sure if its the release or the game, but this has got to be one of the most unstable/buggiest game I have tried in quite some time. Good thing I didn't spend any money on it. Guess I'll try again in a month or three, hope some patches or whatnot will make it work properly by then. 

Cheers for the up though, guess some folks are just lucky and can actually run the damned game.
